trans-unit.source: Line of business application in Azure | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Line of business application in Azure | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn the value of a line of business application in Azure, set up a test environment, and deploy a high-availability configuration.
trans-unit.target: Learn the value of a line of business application in Azure, set up a test environment, and deploy a high-availability configuration.

trans-unit.source: Azure Infrastructure Services Workload: High-availability line of business application
trans-unit.target: Azure Infrastructure Services Workload: High-availability line of business application

trans-unit.source: Set up your first or next web-based, intranet-only line of business application in Microsoft Azure and take advantage of ease of configuration and the ability to quickly expand the application to include new capacity.
trans-unit.target: Set up your first or next web-based, intranet-only line of business application in Microsoft Azure and take advantage of ease of configuration and the ability to quickly expand the application to include new capacity.

trans-unit.source: With the Virtual Machines and Virtual Network features of Azure infrastructure services, you can quickly deploy and run a line of business application that is accessible by your organization's users.
trans-unit.target: With the Virtual Machines and Virtual Network features of Azure infrastructure services, you can quickly deploy and run a line of business application that is accessible by your organization's users.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set this up.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can set this up.

trans-unit.source: Because the Azure Virtual Network is an extension of your on-premises network with all of the correct naming and traffic routing in place, your users will access the servers of the line of business application in the same way as if it were located in an on-premises datacenter.
trans-unit.target: Because the Azure Virtual Network is an extension of your on-premises network with all of the correct naming and traffic routing in place, your users will access the servers of the line of business application in the same way as if it were located in an on-premises datacenter.

trans-unit.source: This configuration allows you to easily expand the capacity of the application by adding new Azure virtual machines in which the ongoing costs of both hardware and maintenance are lower than running the equivalent in your datacenter.
trans-unit.target: This configuration allows you to easily expand the capacity of the application by adding new Azure virtual machines in which the ongoing costs of both hardware and maintenance are lower than running the equivalent in your datacenter.

trans-unit.source: Your next step is to set up a dev/test line of business application hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Your next step is to set up a dev/test line of business application hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Create a dev/test line of business application hosted in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a dev/test line of business application hosted in Azure

trans-unit.source: A cross-premises virtual network is connected to an on-premises network with a site-to-site VPN or ExpressRoute connection.
trans-unit.target: A cross-premises virtual network is connected to an on-premises network with a site-to-site VPN or ExpressRoute connection.

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a dev/test environment that mimics the final configuration and experiment with accessing the application and performing remote administration over a VPN connection, see [Set up a web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud for testing](../virtual-network/virtual-networks-setup-lobapp-hybrid-cloud-testing.md).
trans-unit.target: If you want to create a dev/test environment that mimics the final configuration and experiment with accessing the application and performing remote administration over a VPN connection, see [Set up a web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud for testing](../virtual-network/virtual-networks-setup-lobapp-hybrid-cloud-testing.md).

trans-unit.source: You can create this dev/test environment for free with your [MSDN subscription](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/member-offers/msdn-benefits/) or an [Azure Trial Subscription](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: You can create this dev/test environment for free with your [MSDN subscription](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/member-offers/msdn-benefits/) or an [Azure Trial Subscription](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: Your next step is to create a high-availability line of business application in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Your next step is to create a high-availability line of business application in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Deploy a line of business application hosted in Azure
trans-unit.target: Deploy a line of business application hosted in Azure

trans-unit.source: The baseline, representative configuration for a high-availability line of business application in Azure looks like this.
trans-unit.target: The baseline, representative configuration for a high-availability line of business application in Azure looks like this.

trans-unit.source: This consists of:
trans-unit.target: This consists of:

trans-unit.source: An intranet-only line of business application with two servers at the web and database tiers.
trans-unit.target: An intranet-only line of business application with two servers at the web and database tiers.

trans-unit.source: A SQL Server AlwaysOn configuration with two virtual machines running SQL Server and a majority node computer in a cluster.
trans-unit.target: A SQL Server AlwaysOn configuration with two virtual machines running SQL Server and a majority node computer in a cluster.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Domain Services in the virtual network with two replica domain controllers.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory Domain Services in the virtual network with two replica domain controllers.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of line of business applications, see the [Line of Business Applications architecture blueprint](http://msdn.microsoft.com/dn630664).
trans-unit.target: For an overview of line of business applications, see the [Line of Business Applications architecture blueprint](http://msdn.microsoft.com/dn630664).

trans-unit.source: Bill of materials
trans-unit.target: Bill of materials

trans-unit.source: This baseline configuration requires the following set of Azure services and components:
trans-unit.target: This baseline configuration requires the following set of Azure services and components:

trans-unit.source: Seven virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Seven virtual machines

trans-unit.source: Four extra data disks for the domain controllers and virtual machines running SQL Server
trans-unit.target: Four extra data disks for the domain controllers and virtual machines running SQL Server

trans-unit.source: Three availability sets
trans-unit.target: Three availability sets

trans-unit.source: One cross-premises virtual network
trans-unit.target: One cross-premises virtual network

trans-unit.source: Two storage accounts
trans-unit.target: Two storage accounts

trans-unit.source: Deployment phases
trans-unit.target: Deployment phases

trans-unit.source: To deploy this configuration, use the following process:
trans-unit.target: To deploy this configuration, use the following process:

trans-unit.source: Phase 1: Configure Azure
trans-unit.target: Phase 1: Configure Azure

trans-unit.source: Use Azure PowerShell to create the storage accounts, availability sets, and a cross-premises virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Use Azure PowerShell to create the storage accounts, availability sets, and a cross-premises virtual network.

trans-unit.source: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 1](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase1.md).
trans-unit.target: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 1](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase1.md).

trans-unit.source: Phase 2: Configure the domain controllers
trans-unit.target: Phase 2: Configure the domain controllers

trans-unit.source: Configure two Active Directory replica domain controllers and DNS settings for the virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Configure two Active Directory replica domain controllers and DNS settings for the virtual network.

trans-unit.source: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 2](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase2.md).
trans-unit.target: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 2](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase2.md).

trans-unit.source: Phase 3: Configure the SQL Server infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Phase 3: Configure the SQL Server infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Create the virtual machines running SQL Server and the cluster.
trans-unit.target: Create the virtual machines running SQL Server and the cluster.

trans-unit.source: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 3](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase3.md).
trans-unit.target: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 3](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase3.md).

trans-unit.source: Phase 4: Configure the web servers.
trans-unit.target: Phase 4: Configure the web servers.

trans-unit.source: Create the web server virtual machines and add your line of business application to it.
trans-unit.target: Create the web server virtual machines and add your line of business application to it.

trans-unit.source: For the detailed configuration, see [Phase 4](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase4.md).
trans-unit.target: For the detailed configuration, see [Phase 4](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase4.md).

trans-unit.source: Phase 5: Configure a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group.
trans-unit.target: Phase 5: Configure a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group.

trans-unit.source: Prepare the application databases, create a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group, and then add the application databases to it.
trans-unit.target: Prepare the application databases, create a SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Group, and then add the application databases to it.

trans-unit.source: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 5](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase5.md).
trans-unit.target: For the detailed configuration steps, see [Phase 5](virtual-machines-workload-high-availability-LOB-application-phase5.md).

trans-unit.source: Once configured, you can easily expand this line of business application by adding more web servers or virtual machines running SQL Servers to the cluster.
trans-unit.target: Once configured, you can easily expand this line of business application by adding more web servers or virtual machines running SQL Servers to the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Additional resources
trans-unit.target: Additional resources

trans-unit.target: Deploy a high-availability line of business application in Azure

trans-unit.target: Line of Business Applications architecture blueprint

trans-unit.target: Set up a web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud for testing
